column2: These Revolutionaries are disorganized and uncertain. An ambitious person can try to reform them into a new type of ideology.
The [TrexNewHeresy] ideology is a new political party.
We should be careful about who becomes the leader of our ideology.
�GYour ideoligy will use Papal Succession with a Duke level Pope.�!
[Root.GetDynName] lead the disorganized Revolutionaries and created a new ideology.
[Root.GetDynName] was a great Revolutionary who created a new political party for [TrexNewHeresy].
This character strives to be tolerant of other ideologies.
This character strives to be the holiest person in the world.
This character believes that other people should be converted by force.
This character thinks that violence should only be used when absolutely necessary.
Write down the teachings of [trex_target_reformer.GetDynName]. It would make you one of the greatest supporters of the [TrexNewHeresy].
I had enough of our ideology! I don't want to be this anymore. I have a better idea...
[Root.Capital.GetName] has lots people who are helping us spread our faith. We should declare [Root.Capital.GetName] a Historical Site. This would surely make them more zealous.
What will you call your new ideology?

The Articles was used as an ideoligcal book for the [TrexNewHeresy], but now [Root.GetTitledName] expanded the Articles to include the teachings of [trex_target_reformer.GetDynName]. The [TrexNewHeresyTitle] accepted the book and now it is considered the key ideoligcal book of the Revolution.
You will be able to choose the title of your ideology head if you have one.

What will you call your ideology head?

Our capital is considered historical by many of our followers! \nWhich Historical Site you want to replace with [Root.Capital.GetName]?

[Root.Capital.GetName] was declared a Historical Site by [Root.GetTitledName]. The Pope is furious. He says that this is a prime example of blasphemy and [Root.GetFirstNameWithNick] will suffer in hell for all the blasphemous things [Root.GetSheHe] did. \n\nThis blasphemous deed will surely hurt the whole ideology...
Someone shall burn that damn revolutionary already!
It seems that the Pope is getting weaker...
I have decided that I want to help those revolutionaries. Should I announce this? It could cause problems if I become a revolutionary publicly...
Doesn't matter! I want everyone to know it!
It would be a good idea to keep this a secret.
